ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/addiMobile.xcworkspace -scheme addiMobile -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

ios.sim.release.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/addiMobile.xcworkspace -scheme addiMobile -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build EXCLUDED_ARCHS=arm64 DETOX=1

android.emu.debug.build: cd android && chmod +x gradlew && ./gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..

android.emu.release.build: cd android && gradlew app:assembleRelease assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release && cd ..
